meanings.definition: Bounces: moves up and down or back and forth
meanings.sent1: The ball bonces on the ground.
meanings.sent2: She bonces the basketball to her friend.
meanings.sent3: The bunny bonces happily in the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The bouncing ball bonces higher with each bounce.

meanings.definition: Bounced: moved up and down or back and forth
meanings.sent1: The cat bonces off the bed.
meanings.sent2: The kids bonces on the trampoline.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel bonces off the tree branch.
meanings.sent4: The idea bonces around in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The raindrops bonces off the window pane rhythmically.

meanings.definition: Bouncing: moving up and down or back and forth
meanings.sent1: The bouncing puppy is full of energy.
meanings.sent2: The bouncing ball rolls down the hill.
meanings.sent3: The bouncing music makes everyone dance.
meanings.sent4: Her bouncing curls framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The bouncing waves create a soothing sound at the beach.
